name: Wayworn - EAE 2100 Final
description: Wayworn is a supernatural dating sim set in the charming seaside city of Wayfield. When your father goes missing, it's up to you to unravel the dark mystery plaguing the town. Good thing you're not alone—five romanceable characters await you down at the local bar: The Wayworn Tavern. But watch your back; you never know what could be lurking just around the corner...
